intro: Welcome to the most charming, cozy ice cream parlor in town!
description:
The Secret Ingredient: Empathy
The true delight of Wander Scoop lies in the heartwarming cutscenes and dialogues. Every quirky character who slides onto a stool carries a personal puzzle and different ice cream flavors, and the process of making them serves as a metaphor for life’s challenges and joys. 

Level Up Your Cozy Kingdom
Fortunately, guiding souls and making people happy can also be profitable! As you ace those metaphorical mix-ups and sell your legendary treats, you'll earn money and gain the experience needed to upgrade your arsenal of ingredients and equipment, as well as decorate your parlor.

A Feast for the Eyes and Soul
Sink into a world rendered in a beautiful, colorful, and inviting pastel art style. Everything is soft, rounded, and comforting. Every detail, from the gentle texture of the whipped cream to the subtle shimmer of the ice crystals, is designed to give you a warm hug in game form.

Come on in. The scoop is waiting to be wielded.

KEY FEATURES: 
- 10 unique, flavorful customers to meet and learn their stories
- Tons of delicious new ingredients, equipment, and decor items to be unlocked
- Delightful pastel art style 
- Sweet, cozy atmosphere, encouraging to cherish the simple joys of life
- Smooth, relaxing music
